start.text: The hallway feels cold and empty, shadows dance on the walls, two paths lie ahead, one dark and narrow, one wide and dim

choices.text: Go left into the narrow path
Go right into the wide path

left1.text:
SpookyStudio

The narrow path gets very dark, the walls feel close, strange marks glow faintly on the stones

left2.text: The marks are old symbols that seem to whisper, they look like forgotten writing from long ago

left3.text: The path opens into a small room, a cold breeze blows, something feels like its watching you

left4.text: The symbols form words you can almost understand, they say something about thin walls between worlds

left5.text: In the middle sits a stone box, it feels very cold to touch, mist starts to gather around it

left6.text: You find a hidden door leading to old shelves filled with dusty books, they look very ancient

left7.text: A pale shape appears, a ghost with sad eyes, it floats silently, watching you

left8.text: Inside the box is a glowing stone, it hums softly, the mist grows thicker around you

left9.text: One book has the same symbols on its cover, it feels heavy with old knowledge

left10.text: The ghost lets out a soft moan and fades away, the room feels empty now

left11.text: The ghost listens, in a whispery voice it says, many have come here, few leave the same

left12.text: The stone shows you blurry pictures of the past, old people studying in these rooms

left13.text: The book shows maps of tunnels and warnings about things that live in the dark

left14.text: The ghost sighs, power changes people, be careful what you seek, then it vanishes

right1.text: The wide path stays light enough to see, a soft wind blows from somewhere ahead

right2.text: The wind leads to a hanging light that sways gently, it gives off a soft, steady glow

right3.text: The wind comes from a small hole in the wall, it leads to another room you cannot see

right4.text: The light never goes out, inside it you find words, light shows what darkness hides

right5.text: Thick strings hang from the ceiling like old curtains, they sway in the breeze

right6.text: The hole leads to a ledge overlooking a room full of shiny objects scattered on the floor

right7.text: The light gets brighter, showing carvings on the walls of people fighting shadows

right8.text: You find a narrow path along the wall that goes around the hanging strings

right9.text: The strings stick to you as you walk, big spiders watch from the walls with many eyes

right10.text: You land in the room with shiny things, but something feels wrong, too quiet, too easy

right11.text: The carvings show a great battle, one figure looks just like you

right12.text: The path leads to a hidden room with old weapons and armor, all covered in dust

right13.text: The spiders watch you pass, they seem curious, not mean, they let you go by

right14.text: The spiders ignore you, they seem to be guarding something behind the strings

right15.text: As you touch something, the floor starts to shake, its a trap, you barely get away

right16.text: You find hidden wires and plates, the shiny things were bait to catch the unwary

right17.text: Past the strings is a room with old treasures, the spiders nod as you enter, like they approve

door_appears.text: As you look around, a door materializes from thin air right before your eyes. It shimmers faintly, as if reality itself is bending to create this passage.

door_opened.text: You push open the mysterious door and step through. The air feels different here, warmer, more alive. In the center of this new room stands a magnificent treasure chest, its golden surface gleaming in the dim light.

chest_opened.text: You lift the heavy lid of the treasure chest. Inside, nestled among some gold coins, you find a small iron key and a folded piece of parchment paper.

paper_examined.text: You can even make your own game like this, spooky right?

hallway_continue.text: The corridor feels eerily familiar yet different, an unnatural chill hangs in the air, mysterious shapes move along the walls, two passages await your decision, one shrouded in darkness and tight, one spacious but foreboding

choices.text: Turn left down the tight passage
Turn right toward the spacious path
